revisions.rev: {{Infobox software | logo = [[File:KompoZerLogo.svg|60px]] | screenshot = [[File:Kompozer.png|250px]] | caption = KompoZer 0.7.10 editing Wikipedia main page | collapsible = | author = Fabien Cazenave | developer = | released = | discontinued = | latest release version = 0.7.10 | latest release date = {{release date|2007|08|30}} | latest preview version = 0.8b3 | latest preview date = {{release date|2010|03|01}} | frequently updated = | programming language = | operating system = | platform = [[Cross-platform]] | size = | language = | status = Stalled http://kazhack.org/?post/2011/06/13/One-Year-At-INRIA | genre = [[HTML editor]] | license = [[Mozilla Public License|MPL]]/[[GNU General Public License|GPL]]/[[GNU Lesser General Public License|LGPL]] tri-license | website = [http://kompozer.net/ kompozer.net] }} '''KompoZer''' is an [[open source]] [[WYSIWYG]] HTML editor based on a rewritten version of the now-discontinued [[Nvu]] editor. KompoZer is maintained as a community-driven [[Fork (software development)|fork]] and is a project on [[Sourceforge]]. The current release, KompoZer 0.8 beta 3, has been updated to [[Gecko (layout engine)|Gecko]] 1.8.1. KompoZer's WYSIWYG editing capabilities are one of the main attractions of the software. In addition, KompoZer allows direct code editing as well as a split code-graphic view. == Standards compliance == KompoZer complies with the [[World Wide Web Consortium|W3C]]'s web standards. By default, pages are created in accordance to [[HTML]] 4.01 Strict and use [[Cascading Style Sheets]] (CSS) for styling, but the user can change the settings and choose between: * Strict and transitional [[Document Type Definition|DTD]]'s * HTML 4.01 and [[XHTML]] 1.0 * CSS styling or the old <font> based styling. The application can call on the W3C [[Validator|HTML validator]], which uploads pages to the [[W3C Markup Validation Service]] and checks for compliance. == See also == {{Portal|Free software}} * [[BlueGriffon]] (replaces [[Nvu]]) * [[Comparison of HTML editors]] == External links == * [http://www.kompozer.net/ Official KompoZer website] * [http://kazhack.org/ Official blog of KompoZer's main developer] * [http://www.sf.net/projects/kompozer Project website on SourceForge] * [http://wysifauthoring.informe.com/forum/ Development and User Forums] * [http://www.charlescooke.me.uk/web/kz-ug-home.htm KompoZer and Nvu User Guide Contributed by Charles Cooke] * [http://www.linux.com/news/software/applications/44939-gin-up-a-quick-web-page-with-kompozer Gin Up A Quick Web Page With Kompozer] == References == {{Reflist}} {{HTML editors}} {{FLOSS}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Kompozer}} [[Category:Mozilla]] [[Category:Gecko-based software]] [[Category:Free HTML editors]] [[Category:HTML editors]] [[Category:Portable software]] [[Category:Software forks]] [[Category:Automated WYSIWYG editors]] {{web-software-stub}} [[ar:ÙÙØ¨ÙØ²Ø±]] [[cs:KompoZer]] [[de:KompoZer]] [[es:KompoZer]] [[eo:KompoZer]] [[fr:KompoZer]] [[hsb:KompoZer]] [[it:KompoZer]] [[ms:KompoZer]] [[ja:KompoZer]] [[pt:KompoZer]] [[ru:KompoZer]] [[tr:Kompozer]] [[uk:KompoZer]] [[vi:KompoZer]] [[zh:KompoZer]]
